name: #0000.the last stage
description:
"I have, so to say, lost myself", A line from the very first case of Alzheimer's. Auguste Deter. As she utters those words a few years before the last stage of her illness, alas she completely lost herself and so is the world she once knew. 

A piece as an experience on how Alzheimer's patients experience their illness, and how they perceive the world around them
